amendment.description: Amendment clarifies the factors that must be taken into consideration when recalling a reservist to service to include the frequency of assignment over the duration of a reservist's career.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 109-459 to clarify the factors that must be taken into consideration when recalling a reservist to service to include the frequency of assignment over the duration of a reservist's career.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 415 - 9 (Roll no. 143).
